Package me.normanmaurer.niosmtp

Interface Summary
SMTPClientFuture<E> A Future which allows to register SMTPClientFutureListener and also make it possible to access the contained objects in a blocking fashion.
SMTPClientFutureListener<E> A listener which will get informed once the SMTPClientFuture was done
SMTPMessage The SMTPMessage implementations offer methods to get the message content.
SMTPMessageSubmit  
SMTPPipeliningRequest  
SMTPRequest A SMTP Request which is send to the SMTP-Server
SMTPResponse The SMTP Response which is send back from the SMTP Server to the client
 

Class Summary
SMTPByteArrayMessage Abstract base implementation of SMTPMessage which allows to access the raw byte array of the SMTPMessage.
 

Exception Summary
SMTPConnectionException SMTPException which will get thrown if the connection was timed out or refused
SMTPException Base Exception class for the SMTP Client
SMTPIdleException SMTPException which will get thrown if the connection did idle for to long.
SMTPUnsupportedExtensionException SMTPException sub-class which will get thrown if the client does not support the needed EXTENSION
